title: About Me
content: I am a backend software engineer with a diverse background spanning from university research to educational video game development and virtual reality applications.
My experience focuses on the Java ecosystem and Spring Boot, where I have developed scalable and robust architectures for various enterprise applications.
I am passionate about technology as a tool to solve complex problems and create innovative digital experiences that generate a positive impact.
highlights: Specialized in Java and Spring Framework
Research in educational games and VR
